We refer to Wikipedia articles on film and television for help. The speech is from the movie 'The Social Network' where Mark Zuckerberg starts his speech by saying 'to start things off, congressman Kennedy, we've got some very prestigious universities so which one would you rate better? Harvard? Ah don't look at you right away. Look I um I so they were both extraordinary experiences for me. I think most people would say Harvard.' This implies that the speaker thought both were extraordinary experiences but gives a slight preference to Harvard as it was expected from him to mention Harvard first.

Therefore, the answer is (A).
